ClassDesc: A map of data supported by @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#PutDataMapRequest_E@ and @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#DataMapItem_E@s. DataMap may convert to and from Bundles, but will drop any types not explicitly supported by DataMap in the conversion process.
